3.description: Send Reports on blind state change

paramInformation.label: Automatically switch off after
paramInformation.description: If not zero, automatically switch off after a user defined time

paramInformation.label: What to do on RF off command
paramInformation.description: Defines how to interpret RF Off command.

paramInformation.label: Dimming speed
paramInformation.description: Time to dim on button presses

paramInformation.label: Dimming long speed
paramInformation.description: Time to dim on button holds and StartLevelChange

paramInformation.label: Set maximum light level on On click
Action on button single press or hold
paramInformation.description: Defines which command should be sent on button single press or hold. Basic commands are sent to Association group. Switch All commands are sent broadcast.

options.label: Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set (default)

paramInformation.label: Action on button double press or hold
paramInformation.description: Defines which command should be sent on button double press or press-hold. Basic commands are sent to Association group. This will introduce a small delay for single click commands

options.label: Disabled (don't wait for double click, default)
